text:
RT @ABCNewsLive: Emerald Garner, Eric Garner's daughter: "The world is on pause. There's nothing to distract anyone from the Black Lives Matter movement...The real issue is police officers killing black lives." https://t.co/nvuK2vRbmR

"We march...but we also need to focus on the legislation." https://t.co/nxE9vqpAfC

name: ABC
text: Tacoma, Washington, mayor calls for four officers to be fired and prosecuted after a black man who yelled out "I can't breathe" died in police custody. https://t.co/M6QpcsLdV8

text: Pres. Trump says "no kneeling" after the latest in Drew Brees, National Anthem controversy. https://t.co/nwkkSXB8vV
